title: Carlos Curbelo
deleted: Curbelo supports [[same-sex marriage]]. Upon the landmark Supreme Court ruling ''[[Obergefell v. Hodges]]'', Curbelo stated "I applaud the Supreme Court's ruling, and send my sincerest congratulations to all those who will finally enjoy the same legal rights as their peers."<ref name="Derby62715">{{cite web|last1=Derby|first1=Kevin|title=Same-Sex Marriage Not Much of a Dividing Line in South Florida Congressional Race|url=http://sunshinestatenews.com/story/same-sex-marriage-not-much-dividing-line-south-florida-congressional-race|website=Sunshine State News|access-date=December 24, 2017|language=en|date=June 27, 2015}}</ref>
